definition: the last few years/last several years/recent years

sentences.english: The importance and vulnerability of seed banks have become apparent in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 种子银行的重要性和脆弱性近几年来已很明显。

sentences.english: Analysis and comment are made on the floating cylinder sleeve method known in late years.
sentences.chinese: 对近几年来发表的浮动缸套测量法进行了分析和评述。

sentences.english: Work in this area in recent years have published a total of about 20 kinds.
sentences.chinese: 近几年来又有这方面的著作出版，共计约20余种。

sentences.english: The area's prodigality of forests has raised its ugly head these years.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区近几年泛滥森林的问题十分突出。

sentences.english: Wavelet transform is attractive widely for recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近几年来小波变换受到广泛的重视。

sentences.english: The development situation of new techniques for metal anode cells in our company is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍公司近几年金属阳极电解槽技术开发进展情况。

sentences.english: The costs associated with a typical home pregnancy test have also dropped in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 典型家用早孕检测试纸的价格近几年也下降了。

sentences.english: In recent years, there is a rapid development of community-run kindergartens.
sentences.chinese: 近几年来，社会力量办园发展迅速。

sentences.english: Cases of kidnaping are gradually rising during recent years, especially in the southeast coast area.
sentences.chinese: 近几年来，绑架勒赎案件增多，危害日益严重。

sentences.english: In recent years Selections of Poems by Niu Han were published in South Korea and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 近几年日本和韩国译编出版了牛汉诗选集。

sentences.english: Lloyd's curves are not suited for the new diesel engines developed over the past few years.
sentences.chinese: 劳氏曲线已不适用于近几年来所发展的新型柴油机。

sentences.english: Gathers congeals a new technology which the amine French penicillin blood is develops in the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 聚凝胺法配血是近几年来发展起来的一项新技术。

sentences.english: The study of C-P in solution is more important recently.
sentences.chinese: 对溶液中络合物的研究更是近几年来的热门课题。

sentences.english: In recent years, concocting behavior of accountancy in China's listed company hasn't been forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 近几年来，我国上市公司的会计造假行为屡禁不止。

sentences.english: In recent years, DNA micro-array technology gets a rapid development.
sentences.chinese: 基因芯片技术是近几年来迅速发展的生物高技术。

sentences.english: Here you can find a collection of travelogues of the places we have been travelled to recent years.
sentences.chinese: 在这里汇总了我们近几年来的一些游记。

definition: the last few years/last several years/recent years
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
(of prices, rates etc) to remain high
a few years/several years/how many years
in the past always/for a long time now/until now
(a product) sells well/to be in demand
